description.brief: AUV-IITB: The entire software stack for the Robosub Competition 2014

stack.description: The stack contains * driver for the vn100 IMU * a simulator for the vehicle developed for the year 2014 * firmware to be run on the embedded systems (non-ROS code) * a package to communicate with the embedded system over CAN and UART * a package to process underwater images (specific to the competition * navigation and mission planner system * debug inerface to interact with the vehicle
stack.author: Maintained by AUV-IITB, 2014
